description: This file defines the routing configuration for the TV section of a Flutter app. It includes route mappings, argument classes for passing data between screens, and imports necessary UI components.

classes.name: TvRouter
classes.description: Provides named route mappings for the TV section, including route definitions for home, listing, detail, and reader screens.

classes.name: TvListingArgs
classes.description: Wrapper class for arguments passed to the TV Listing route, encapsulating the category.

classes.name: TvDetailArgs
classes.description: Wrapper class for arguments passed to the TV Detail route, encapsulating the title.

classes.name: TvReaderArgs
classes.description: Wrapper class for arguments passed to the TV Reader route, encapsulating the title.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Returns a map of route names to widget builder functions, configuring the navigation for the TV experience.
